fields.name: not ready
fields.description: Requirement declined by approver

fields.name: ready
fields.description: Requirement approved

fields.name: n/a
fields.description: not applicable. That requirement doesn't need for that component

fields.title: Conformance
fields.description: Component doesn't duplicate others, has proper dependencies, has accurate description, etc

fields.title: Vulnerability management
fields.description: Component has periodical vulnerabilities scan (e.g. static scan and external black box audit) and fixes

fields.title: DataBase anonymisation
fields.description: Database replicas accessed by R&D teams should be anonymised, if any

fields.title: Design review
fields.description: Late involvement of operation team into the development process leads to delays for the release and bring operations problems for the component in production.

fields.title: Deployment
fields.description: Component meets defined deployment requirements, e.g. deployed as kubernetes pod and takes DB credentials from env variables.

fields.title: Safe restart
fields.description: Most of the updates and other operations on containers lead to downtime if the component keeps a state on the same container.

fields.title: Backup and restore
fields.description:
Operation team should be able to perform the consistent online backup of the component.
Operation team should be able to restore the component if the component data is corrupted.

fields.title: Databases access
fields.description:
One database account used by several components is insecure and may lead to data corruption.
Direct access to a database of another component may lead to data corruption, problems for another component, and incorrect results as well.
No way to easily check what is going to be changed in database schema within product upgrade.

fields.title: Scalability
fields.description: Component is horizontally scalable and has appropriate load balancing

fields.title: High Availability
fields.description: Component meets high-availability requirements and can survive in case of infrastructure outages

fields.title: Zero-downtime upgrade
fields.description: Component supports zero-downtime upgrade

fields.title: Metris
fields.description: Component provides all necessary metrics to understand if it works properly

fields.title: Logging completeness
fields.description: Component generates enough logs for easy troubleshooting

fields.title: Logging format
fields.description: Logging format is compliant with company standards (e.g. has proper JSON schema)

fields.title: Logging storage
fields.description: Logs are being delivered to proper logs storage and has proper retention configured

fields.title: HTTP requests tracing
fields.description: Component supports HTTP tracing for easy requests path tracking

fields.name: Operational requirements
